alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 11:46PM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY MORNING... ...THE WINTER STORM WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches above 4,500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 inch or less from 3,000 feet to 4,500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...The Kern County mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and travel delays. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibilities. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a 38 percent chance of 1 inch of snow or more along the Grapevine over Tejon Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
